mapper.update:
update sal_chance_t
chc_create_by = #{chcCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_create_date = #{chcCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
chc_create_id = #{chcCreateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chc_cust_name = #{chcCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_desc = #{chcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_due_date = #{chcDueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
chc_due_id = #{chcDueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chc_due_to = #{chcDueTo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chc_linkman = #{chcLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_rate = #{chcRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chc_source = #{chcSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_status = #{chcStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_tel = #{chcTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chc_title = #{chcTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where chc_id = #{chcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sal_chance_t set chc_create_by = #{chcCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_create_date = #{chcCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chc_create_id = #{chcCreateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chc_cust_name = #{chcCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_desc = #{chcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_due_date = #{chcDueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chc_due_id = #{chcDueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chc_due_to = #{chcDueTo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chc_linkman = #{chcLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_rate = #{chcRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chc_source = #{chcSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_status = #{chcStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_tel = #{chcTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chc_title = #{chcTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where chc_id = #{chcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sal_chance_t where 1=1
and chc_create_date >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and chc_create_date <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and chc_cust_name like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
and chc_title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and chc_linkman like concat('%',#{linkman},'%')
order by chc_id desc
order by chc_id asc
limit ${(page-1)*rows},${rows}

select count(*) from sal_chance_t where 1=1
and chc_create_date >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and chc_create_date <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and chc_cust_name like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
and chc_title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and chc_linkman like concat('%',#{linkman},'%')
